long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enhance your learning and engagement with this extension, designed to quickly generate high-quality quizzes on any topic in seconds. Play solo or challenge your friends for an interactive experience.

Ideal for study aids, team-building activities, audience engagement, or simply for fun, this tool allows you to quiz yourself effortlessly.

You can create quizzes from an entire webpage or by selecting specific paragraphs. Just right-click, select number of questions and language and the quiz is ready!
